abstract: A frightening but beautiful ball of smoke.
description: Darryl Jordan and his partner prepare their home for the encroaching bushfires. The wait for D-day is all-consuming for this family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
